title: Nothing Lasts Forever
description: We were supposed to wears the rings for the rest of our lives.We were supposed to sign the divorce papers and be done with each other.We were supposed to move on and forget about everything that happened. We were supposed to have it all but nothing lasts forever...Until one phone call brings him back, brings the truth back, and brings back these words:"I'm not asking for a second chance, I just want to finish what we started."
author: London Casey
